extension.description: [I]A New Generation[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant Movies and TV[/B][CR][CR]This addon does not form part of the Kodi Media Centre. Please do not seek assistance with this addon from any of the Official Kodi Support Channels.[CR][CR]The author does not host any of the content in this addon and takes no responsibility for content found.

[I]Nova generacija[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant Filmova i TV serija[/B][CR][CR]Ovaj dodatak ne sadrži dijelove Kodi Medijskog Centra. Ne tažite pomoć za ovaj dodatak na službenim kanalima podrške za Kodi.[CR][CR]Autor ne posjeduje bilo kakav sadržaj u ovom dodatku i ne preuzima bilo kakvu odgovornost za pronađeni sadržaj.

[I]הדור החדש[/I][CR][CR][B]Covenant סרטים וסדרות[/B][CR][CR]ההרחבה הזו אינה חלק של Kodi Media Center. אנא אל תבקש עזרה עם ההרחבה זה מכל אחד מערוצי התמיכה הרשמיים של Kodi [CR][CR]. אין למחבר תוכן בהרחבה הזו והמחבר אינו אחראי לתוכן שנמצא.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!

Autor ovog dodatka ne posjeduje bilo kakav sadržaj koji je pronađen i nije povezan sa bilo kojim izvorom sadržaja. Ovaj dodatak samo pretražuje sadržaj na web stranicama. Koristite ga na vlastitu odgovornost!
מחבר ההרחבה זה אינו מארח את התוכן שיתכן ויימצא ואין לו זיקה לאף אחד מספקי התוכן. הרחבה רק מחפשת תוכן שקיים באתרי אינטרנט. השימוש בהרחבה הוא על אחריותך בלבד!
The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.description: Metadata for Covenant are maintained separately to make distribution of the the addon itself easier/faster.

extension.summary: Downloads Artwork for TV shows, Movies and Music videos for addons and stores them in a local SQLITE database
extension.description: Queries, stores, and returns metadata for TV shows, Movies and Musicvideos. [CR]Sources:[CR]www.thetvdb.com[CR]www.themoviedb.org[CR]www.imdb.com[CR]www.omdbapi.com[CR]This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

extension.summary: HTML/XML parser for quick-turnaround applications like screen-scraping
extension.description: Beautiful Soup parses arbitrarily invalid SGML and provides a variety of methods and Pythonic idioms for iterating and searching the parse tree.
A small plugin for playing reddit acestreams
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host or distribute any of the content displayed by this addon. The author does not have any affiliation with the content provider.

extension.description: Plexus - Any complex structure containing an intricate network of parts. Plexus brings native peer-to-peer support (AceStream and SopCast) for Kodi Entertainment Center for several platforms.[CR][CR]Documentation: (missing)

Plexus - Uma estrutura complexa constituída por uma rede de partes. O Plexus adiciona suporte peer-to-peer nativo (AceStream e Sopcast) ao Kodi Entertainment Center para várias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentação: (em falta)

Plexus - Una estructura compleja conteniendo una intrincada red de partes. Plexus añade soporte nativo peer-to-peer (AceStream y SopCast) al Centro de Entretenimiento Kodi para varias plataformas.[CR][CR]Documentacion: (falta)
extension.disclaimer: The author does not host nor distribute any of the content you may watch using this addon. The author has no part in the development of any included technologies. When seeking help in Kodi's forum please respect rules (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

Os autores não alojam nem distribuem nenhum do conteúdo que poderá ser reproduzido a partir deste addon. Os autores não têm qualquer parte no desenvolvimento de qualquer uma das tecnologias. Se procurar ajuda no fórum oficial do Kodi por favor respeite as regras do fórum (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

El autor no aloja ni distribuye cualquier contenido que ud. pudiera reproducir usando este addon. El autor no tiene participacion en el desarrollo de cualquier tecnologia incluida. Cuando requiera ayuda en el foro de Kodi por favor respete las reglas (http://kodi.wiki/view/Forum_rules).

extension.summary: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju.
extension.description: Resolve common video host URL's to be playable in XBMC/Kodi, simplify addon development of video plugins requiring multi video hosts.
Prilagodi najčešće URL-ove video izvora kako bi radili u XBMC/Kodiju, pojednostavnjuje razvoj priključaka za video dodatke koji zahtjevaju višestruke video izvore.

This addon allows you to activate and modify a large number of advanced settings in Kodi without having to manually create and populate an advancedsettings.xml file. WARNING: these settings are for advanced users only. Use at your own risk.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 29 June 2007
